What are you struggling with and how can: Chii chauri kunetseka nazvo uye isu tingabatsira sei?
How did you put into practice the script: Wakaisa sei mukuita rugwaro / nyaya yatakadzidza nguva yekupedzisira takasangana?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Wakagovana ndiani wakagovana chidzidzo chevhiki rapfuura uye zvakafamba sei?
What needs did you meet in the community: Ndezvipi zvinodiwa zvaunosangana navo munharaunda svondo rapfuura?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Kumbira mumwe munhu kuti averenge ndima imwe chete panguva.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Ita kuti nhengo yeboka iudze mumashoko avo.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Bvunza boka kana vakawedzera chero chinhu kana kusiiwa chero chinhu kunze.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Paunopedza nendima dzese, bvunza mumwe munhu muboka kuti ataure nyaya yese nenyaya. Ita kuti boka riruramise chero zvikanganiso.
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Kana ndima iyi ichokwadi, maitiro api atinofanira kuchinja vhiki ino?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Ndiani uchaudza uyu nyaya vhiki ino?
What needs can we meet in the community: Ndezvipi zvinodiwa zvatingasangana munharaunda vhiki ino?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Ungada kuwana neshamwari dzako izvo zvakaita Mwari uye kuti Mwari anoda kuti urarame sei?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Heano mimwe mibvunzo yekuita kuti hurukuro yako itange.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Ungada kuzviwanira iwe pachako izvo Mwari zvaakaita uye kuti Mwari anoda kuti urarame sei?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Vanhu vazhinji vanofarira kuita izvi zviwanikwa muboka neshamwari dzavo.
